constructor-arg.value: SELECT id, name, description, price, picturePath FROM onlineshopschema.products;
INSERT INTO onlineshopschema.products(name, description, price, picturePath) VALUES (:name, :description, :price, :picturePath);
SELECT id, name, description, price, picturePath FROM onlineshopschema.products WHERE id = :id;
SELECT u.login, u.password, r.role FROM onlineshopschema.users u JOIN onlineshopschema.user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN onlineshopschema.roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE login = :login;
